name: VibriosisTestsForVibrionaceaeSpeciesExceptToxigenicVibrioCholeraO1AndO139ByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Vibriosis (Tests for Vibrionaceae species [except Toxigenic Vibrio cholera O1 and O139] by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Toxigenic Vibrio cholera O1 and O139.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Vibrio culture;  

LOINC search: “(vibrio or Grimontia or Photobacterium) and (culture or isolate) -water”),(Exclusion Criteria: LOINC system = Water;)

Vibrio sp identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
